group_1.textRight: Excuse the intrusion~...

group_1.textLeft: We heard you're getting discharged soon,@is that right?

group_1.textCenter: It sure is. Thanks you guys for all the concern!
Actually, I've been waiting for you three.

group_1.textRight: Mm, for us?

group_1.textLeft: That's right! You've got the bestest timing.
To be with Momoko and hear those words...

group_1.textRight: That's a shocker for me, too.

group_1.textLeft: I've got a request to ask you.
What you three feel is the most Halloweeny@thing in the world...
I want you to tell me!

group_1.textRight: Eh...? Why?

group_1.textLeft: Umm, well...@It would be a long story if I got started, but...

group_1.textRight: You're trying to figure out Halloween spirit, so you@want our opinions...?
... I'm sorry, Karin,
I said something really mean to you, didn't I...

group_1.textLeft: No, you did nothing wrong, Kaede!
If I had unwavering confidence in myself
I wouldn't have gotten upset over what you@said, Kaede.

group_1.textRight: ... But, you said you wanted revenge by leaving@her speechless, ya?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101202:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]T-That was...
I said I wanted to resolve my Halloween spirit to surprise Kaede.
A declaration of my determination!
The point is that you're upset Kaede told you@that you have no Halloween spirit,
so you want to prove yourself to her, right?

group_1.textRight: ... Wait, you're putting the blame all on Kaede here,
but you said something awful yourself,@didn't ya Rena?

group_1.textLeft: There's times where you shouldn't tell someone@the truth.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Woah, Rena!

group_1.textLeft: Uu...@T-That was rude of me!

group_1.textRight: ... I am really sorry.
If you want to regain your self-confidence,
then I'll support you any way possible...!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks a bunch!
But what I want now isn't an apology.
What I want to know is
what you guys feel is the greatest part of@Halloween!

group_1.textRight: Something that feels like Halloween...@Halloween spirit, huh...

group_1.textLeft: Oh- don't think about it, just tell me your@gut instinct.
I think that's how I'll get closer to finding@Halloween spirit!

group_1.textRight: Sure... Well for me,
shouting "trick or treat!" has gotta be it!
For Rena it's... costumes?

group_1.textLeft: Mhm, mhm...

group_1.textRight: Oh, speaking of costumes,
LinkS' Ricchan...@Her new Halloween costume sure is cute.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hold on, you're changing faves?@Weren't you all about Sacchan?

group_1.textRight: Nah, I'm talkin' about their costumes.

group_1.textLeft: Umm... And Kaede?
What makes you think of Halloween spirit?

group_1.textRight: Well... for me... pumpkins, I suppose?
... Every year, my family and I pick pumpkins@from our vegetable garden
and we carve them into faces and decorate them...

group_1.textLeft: Hehh... So you do homemade jack-o'-lanterns.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, they're pumpkin lanterns.
When we decorate our rooms with pumpkins,@that's what feels the most like Halloween...

group_1.textLeft: ... I see.
Pumpkins... Costumes... Trick or treat...

group_1.textRight: U-Umm...@Did those answers help you... I wonder?

group_1.textLeft: Of course they did!@Thanks a bunch, you three!

group_1.narration: "What does Halloween feel like?"...@To find the answer to this question,@I began drawing a new manga.
